library(glue)

theme_set(theme_linedraw(base_size = 12))

geomean <- function(x){exp(mean(log(x)))}
quibble <- function(x, q = c(0.05, 0.5, 0.95)) {
  tibble("{{ x }}" := quantile(x, q), 
         "{{ x }}_q" := paste0("P",
                               formatC(q * 100, width = 2, format = "d", flag = "0")))
}
